name: Perihelion by Guido Spannocchi - Pre Print - Solar Flare Edition - 1 of 3
description: Exclusive "Solar Flare" Edition of Guido Spannocchi's Perihelion Album Preprint. Blue + Transparent vinyl, handsigned by the artist. Holder's receive life-long access to any of Guido's shows. All funds will be used for upcoming touring and album production. Only 3 blue vinyl preprints exist. Holder's can contact the artist at audioguido@gmail.com to receive their physical copy.
